thread.title: Why it’s so important that you get up and walk around on a long flight
thread.title_full: Why it’s so important that you get up and walk around on a long flight

title: Why it’s so important that you get up and walk around on a long flight
text:
January 04, 2017 at 14:04 PM EST Why it’s so important that you get up and walk around on a long flight 
Flying is statistically one of the safest ways of traveling, however sitting for long periods of time could be dangerous to your health.
